adp_userinfo.lib package¶

Submodules¶

adp_userinfo.lib.userInfoHelper module¶

class adp_userinfo.lib.userInfoHelper.UserInfoHelper(connObj)[source]¶

Bases: object

Helper class for the user_info API Product

Attributes: connObj: instance of ADPAPIConnection - could be either ClientCredentialsConnection or AuthorizationCodeConnection

callAPI(apiuri)[source]¶

ADP API requester that makes the actual api calls and returns the responses

Attibutes: apiri: the actual API uri to be called Returns: response from the api GET request

getUserInfo()[source]¶

Helper method to get the user_info by calling the proper ADP API.

Returns: UserInfo JSON object upon a successful response An unsuccessful response raises the APICallError containing the status code and message returned by the api call

adp_userinfo.lib.userinfoexceptions module¶

exception adp_userinfo.lib.userinfoexceptions.APICallError(cname, code, msg)[source]¶

Bases: adp_userinfo.lib.userinfoexceptions.Error

Generic Exception raised for non-2xx errors returned from API calls.

exception adp_userinfo.lib.userinfoexceptions.Error(cname, code, msg)[source]¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Base class for exceptions in this module.

Attributes:
cname – class in which the error occurred code – error code msg – error message

class adp_userinfo.lib.userinfourlmap.userInfoURLMap[source]¶

Bases: object

This class provides the access to the mapping between the high-level method calls and the corresponding ADP API calls for the userinfo product
